text: Ana huteno Deviti'ene maka Israeli vahe'enena Anumzamofo huhagerafi huvempage vogisi omerinaku Juda nagamofo moparega Kiriat-Jearimi vu'naze. Hagi ana vogisimofo agofetura tare ankerontre trohuntenegeno, ana ankerontremofo amu'nompi Ra Anumzamomofo kini trara mani'nege'za agia nehaza vogisie.
